title: Christmas & New year 2018 - Watch Faces XMAS
summary: The best watch faces of Christmas & New Year 2018. Choose between 60 different.
description: Enjoy the Christmas and the New Year 2018 with this amazing set of 60 interactive watch faces !Choose between different XMAS themes : crowns, lights, balls, trees, candles, gifts, Snowman, Santa, new year's eve day, etc.It includes three packages of Christmas watch faces: "Mix", "Trees" and "Balls"It is designed for all types of watches, both round and square.After installing the application on Android Wear you could select the watch face set of "Christmas Mix", "Christmas Trees" or "Christmas Balls".Features:* Three packages with different Christmas themes.* Includes 60 different watch faces (30 mix, 15 trees and 15 balls).* Interactive watch faces: tap to change the current watch face to the next.* A padlock to lock the face you like.* Available for all kind of watches (compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches,‚Ä¶).* Designed for round and square watches.* Energy saving management with the ambient mode to save & increase the battery life.* Compatible with Android 6 (Marshmallow).When you have selected one of the 3 packs you can change from the current watch face in the pack to the next (in the same pack) by tapping anywhere.The app uses the interactive functionality to change the watch face tapping anywhere in the screen except in a padlock that you can find in the upper right corner.You can lock the watch face you've selected tapping the padlock (closing it). If you tap the padlock again (opening it) you could change the watch face.Google includes the possibility of the interactive watch faces, so your Android Wear should be updated in order to use it. Make sure that the Android Wear version is 1.3 as minimum.Android Wear: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.wearable.appIf you encounter problems or you have comments, please email me at info@simplesapps.com.Now you can wish a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year with this set of amazing watch faces.
descriptionHTML:
Enjoy the Christmas and the New Year 2018 with this amazing set of 60 interactive watch faces !

Choose between different XMAS themes : crowns, lights, balls, trees, candles, gifts, Snowman, Santa, new year's eve day, etc.

It includes three packages of Christmas watch faces: "Mix", "Trees" and "Balls"
It is designed for all types of watches, both round and square.

After installing the application on Android Wear you could select the watch face set of "Christmas Mix", "Christmas Trees" or "Christmas Balls".

Features:

* Three packages with different Christmas themes.
* Includes 60 different watch faces (30 mix, 15 trees and 15 balls).
* Interactive watch faces: tap to change the current watch face to the next.
* A padlock to lock the face you like.
* Available for all kind of watches (compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches,…).
* Designed for round and square watches.
* Energy saving management with the ambient mode to save & increase the battery life.
* Compatible with Android 6 (Marshmallow).

When you have selected one of the 3 packs you can change from the current watch face in the pack to the next (in the same pack) by tapping anywhere.

The app uses the interactive functionality to change the watch face tapping anywhere in the screen except in a padlock that you can find in the upper right corner.

You can lock the watch face you've selected tapping the padlock (closing it). If you tap the padlock again (opening it) you could change the watch face.

Google includes the possibility of the interactive watch faces, so your Android Wear should be updated in order to use it. Make sure that the Android Wear version is 1.3 as minimum.
Android Wear: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.wearable.app

If you encounter problems or you have comments, please email me at info@simplesapps.com.

Now you can wish a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year with this set of amazing watch faces.
comments: It took me a few minutes to get it, but once I did, it works & looks great

Unable to load onto watch Did updates, ensured both devices on same network, Uninstaller and reinstalled twice, nothing is working.  It will be great I am sure once u get to use it. So far, paid over a dollar for nothing.
What's with the lock? **** Unfortunately the unsightly lock is no deal for me, refunded, it's a watch face, not a home screen----Sorry probz a dumb Question, what's with the lock on the watch face??
Can only access one image from each set. And not the ones I want!
Great little app!! Great customer service too, as I was to thick to work out how to use it, thanks again David, love this app makes me smile
Nice! Made my morning! I like that you can switch faces from the watch! Many nice looking faces. Since are just OK, but so many choices for a little over a buck. üëçüëå
